name: Tim Banks is a little pear-shaped thing

content.html: Do crazy talented founders give their employees the same share of company equity as them or are they just trying to get rich and exploit people by telling them that talented people don’t work for a lot of money?
content.value: Do crazy talented founders give their employees the same share of company equity as them or are they just trying to get rich and exploit people by telling them that talented people don’t work for a lot of money?
